content.name: sasPort
content.description: (Applies to physical deployments only.) Information about Serial Attached SCSI (SAS) ports in the storage system.

attributes.name: currentSpeed
attributes.description: Current speed of the SAS port.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the SAS port needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - SAS port needs replacement.
  • false - SAS port does not need replacement.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Class and identifier of the SAS port's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: port
attributes.description: <font color=#0f0f0f>Physical SAS port number on the storage processor.  Valid values are 0 and 1.</font>

attributes.name: parentIOModule
attributes.description: (Applies if the SAS port resides on an I/O module.) Parent I/O module of the SAS port, as defined by the ioModule resource type.

attributes.name: parentStorageProcessor
attributes.description: (Applies if the SAS port resides directly on an SP.) Parent SP of the SAS port, as defined by the storageProcessor resource type.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the SAS port, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the SAS port instance.

attributes.name: storageProcessor
attributes.description: SP on which the SAS port directly or indirectly resides, as defined by the storageProcessor resource type.
